TypeSignature.Value: public delegate bool GlyphFromNameDelegate(Font font, object fontData, string name, out uint glyph);
.class public auto ansi sealed GlyphFromNameDelegate extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: The glyph name to look up.
When this method returns, contains the glyph identifier if found.
